definitions.title: n.pr.m. 1.
definitions.body: Arabian tribe, called son of Joktan Ge 10:27 (cf. Di) = 1Ch 1:21; Glas:ii. 435 comp. Dauram near Ṣangâ in Yemen (Sab. [[הדרום]] CIS:iv. 1. p. 1; LXX (Odorra Ge 10:27, LXXL Odorram\ 1Ch 1:21 LXXB om, LXXL Adwram).
son of Tou ([[תּׂעוּ]]) king of Hamath 1Ch 18:10 (LXX (Idouraam, LXXL Aqwram); so rd. prob. in ‖ 2Sa 8:10, for [[יוֹרָם]], cf. LXX )Ieddouran, v. We Dr)—[[הֲדׂרָם]] v. p. 214.
